column4: pulseaudio question. when I boot up my 10.04.3 desktop the volume is at 140%. I have to open vol manger and turn it down, anyone help weith that?

anyone know pulseaudio config file location? for amplified gain on output vol?
it's version 1:0.9.22~0.9.21+stable-queue-32-g8478-0ubuntu14.1
/home/.pulse
is it the default.pa?
it might even be equalizerrc I support.
unknown - I think it's user specific setting in that file.

good luck
